upgrades.name: Build Pots of Oil
upgrades.description: Fortifies the objective with pots of burning oil.

upgrades.name: Additional Guards
upgrades.description: Recruits additional guards to protect the objective.

upgrades.name: Storage Expansion
upgrades.description: Increases the objective's maximum supply hold size by 400.

upgrades.name: Reinforced Walls
upgrades.description: Increases the health and defense values of the objective's walls and gates to reinforced levels.

upgrades.name: Recruit Services
upgrades.description: Recruits a siege-weapon vendor, a banker, and an armor repairer to the objective.

upgrades.name: Recruit Patrols
upgrades.description: Recruit guards to patrol the objective

upgrades.name: Fortified Walls
upgrades.description: Increases the health and defense values of the objective's walls and gates to fortified levels.

upgrades.name: Build Waypoint
upgrades.description: Fortifies the objective with a waypoint.

upgrades.name: Guard Training
upgrades.description: Increases the level of all guards at the objective.

upgrades.name: Storage Expansion
upgrades.description: Increases the objective's maximum supply hold size by 400.
